title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 421.3 - Objectives of information security program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 421.3 - Objectives of information security program

State Regulations
A licensee's information security program shall be designed to: (a) ensure the security and confidentiality of customer information; (b) protect against any anticipated threats or hazards to the security or integrity of such information; and
(c) protect against unauthorized access to or use of such information that could result in substantial harm or inconvenience to any customer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11

421.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
